question: Which among the following is/are correct regarding Call Money?
option1: No Collateral is required in Call Money transaction
option2: It is the money lent/borrowed for maximum period of 30 days
option3: It is the money lent/borrowed for maximum period of 45 days
answer: No Collateral is required in Call Money transaction
explanation: Call money is the money lent/borrowed for maximum period of 14 days. No Collateral is required in Call Money transaction. Banks borrow primarily from the inter-bank (call money) market.
